title: misc/vim: Go filetype plugin doesn't set 'comments' and 'commentstring' settings
body:
by **676c7473**: 
Neither 'comments' nor 'commentstring' is set in the Vim runtime files. Therefore Vim
falls back to the default values for these settings, which are not appropriate for Go.

Good practice is to set both in the filetype's ftplugin, that is
misc/vim/ftplugin/go.vim (to be created).

A reasonable setting for Go would be:

setlocal comments=s1:/*,mb:*,ex:*/,://
setlocal commentstring=//\ %s
